quest.name: In Steep Trouble
journal:
Seigetsu the Enlightened is in need of an adventurer who does not believe in superstitions.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Use the firecrackers to aid the stuporous Namazu.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Thank goodness you're here. I know not how, but a number of my kin appear to have been bewitched. They stand about uttering nonsense all day, eyes rolled into the backs of their heads.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: From my readings of Unbeaten Tracks in Yanxia, however, I believe I have discovered a means to rouse them from this inexplicable stupor. Apparently, the sudden flash and sound of firecrackers has been known to return cognitive function to those suffering from symptoms much like those I've seen in the others.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Might I ask you to carry out this ritual and return them to their senses?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: They were last seen wandering about the Sea of Blades. Use these firecrackers, but try not to hurt them─they still have work to do!

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03127A
dialogue.text: My knees feel weak, and my arms so heavy. I can't go on. No, no. Not another step.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03127B
dialogue.text: Everything keeps spinning... Round and round, in endless circles.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03127C
dialogue.text: My stomach keeps twisting and turning. It's all I can do not to heave.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03127A
dialogue.text: Wh-What...? How did I get here? Strange... I suddenly feel refreshed. Reinvigorated and ready to work. Well, I better be off. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03127B
dialogue.text: Who─oh! Oh dear. I know how this looks... Actually, I don't, but I'm sure it's not good. I promise this won't happen again, no, no.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03127C
dialogue.text: Thank you, thank you. I feel so much better now. Yes, yes. If you'll excuse me, I need to be heading back to Dhoro Iloh.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: The others returned not long ago, full of vim and vigor, ready to get back to work. Those fireworks were more effective than I had hoped.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: I realize before I said they appeared bewitched, but surely you don't believe such a thing could happen, do you? What's more likely is they stole sips of the sacred tea we have saved for one of our myriad celebrations.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Which means we have discovered a cure for inebriation─yet another leap toward a more civilized Namazu society!
